section.heading: No advance waivers.
section.text: A provision in a covered loan whereby a borrower waives in advance a violation of this chapter shall be void.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 217 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).
